member.name: M:ASE2024_Assignment.Form1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the form and graphics object.

member.name: M:ASE2024_Assignment.Form1.button1_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Run button click event. Executes the commands entered in the ProgramWindow.

member.name: M:ASE2024_Assignment.Form1.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the pen to the specified coordinates.

member.name: M:ASE2024_Assignment.Form1.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a line from the current pen position to the specified coordinates.

member.name: M:ASE2024_Assignment.Form1.DrawCircle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a circle at the current pen position.
member.exception: Thrown if the radius is negative.

member.name: M:ASE2024_Assignment.Form1.DrawRect(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a rectangle at the current pen position.

member.name: M:ASE2024_Assignment.Form1.ChangePenColor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the pen color using RGB values.
member.exception: Thrown if RGB values are out of range.

member.name: M:ASE2024_Assignment.Form1.WriteText(System.String)
member.summary: Writes text at the current pen position.

member.name: T:ASE2024_Assignment.InvalidCommandException
member.summary: Custom exception for invalid BOOSE commands.
